means: 坚决地，坚定不移地，坚强不屈地

sentence.Network_en: She was adamantly opposed to her husband travelling to Brussels.
sentence.Network_cn: 她坚决反对丈夫前往布鲁塞尔。

sentence.Network_en: " Come over here, " he told her adamantly.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 到这边来, ” 他对她坚定地说.

sentence.Network_en: His family were adamantly opposed to the marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的家人坚决反对这门亲事.

list.abs: the physician adamantly refused to perform an abortion .医生坚定地拒绝做一个人工流产。
～+副词stay adamantly 坚定地停留stay briefly 短暂地停留

Thereafter , the son of a father adamantly refused to re - enter the home ., 此后 , 父亲坚决拒绝儿子一家再进这个家门.

entry.def: If someone is adamant about something, they are determined not to change their mind about it.

example.ex: The prime minister is adamant that he will not resign...
Sue was adamant about that job in Australia.
example.tran: 对澳大利亚的那份工作，休的态度很坚决。

auth_sentence.content: I adamantly refuse to pursue this exchange any further!

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I adamantly refuse to pursue this exchange any further!

auth_sentence.content: But Feinstein was adamantly opposed to the recall process.

auth_sentence.content: He also adamantly denies wanting to go over the fiscal cliff.
